physical_appearance:This is a photograph of the  ruins of the Jeta Wariarama in Polanarua
 Sri Lanka. The temple is on a hill
 with thick vegetation surrounding the concrete structure. There is a rough stone fence at the foreground of the photograph. In the middle of the photograph
 there is the remains of a standing Buddha
 bordered by two tall columns on either side. There is a man standing on the slope in front of the Buddha statue. The word \u0027LAWTON\u0027 is handwritten on the photograph on the left. The title is written at the bottom
 below the photograph.

metadata.title_text: Photograph album of views and portraits in the Punjab, Cashmere, Ceylon, Burma, Penang, Singapore, and Java Jeta Wariarama, East Front, Interior, Polanarùa, Ceylon
metadata.materials_name: albumen (egg white protein) albumen paper paper (fiber product)
metadata.physical_appearance: This is a photograph of the  ruins of the Jeta Wariarama in Polanarua, Sri Lanka. The temple is on a hill, with thick vegetation surrounding the concrete structure. There is a rough stone fence at the foreground of the photograph. In the middle of the photograph, there is the remains of a standing Buddha, bordered by two tall columns on either side. There is a man standing on the slope in front of the Buddha statue. The word 'LAWTON' is handwritten on the photograph on the left. The title is written at the bottom, below the photograph.
metadata.subject_terms_2: Photographs Thomson, J. (John), 1837-1921 Polonnaruwa (Sri Lanka) Buddhism Temples Ruins
